Class MarketingManagerSalesCreationC

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.MarketingManagerSalesCreationC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MarketingManagerSalesCreationC
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    this is a controller for MarketingManagerSalesCreation gui. we enter this form when we click on the rates button in the main window the form simply display two buttons that will lead us to the reports forms

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkDate()
      checkDate : this function checks if the inserted date is correct it will be correct only if the date value is a date after todey's date
      boolean checkFields()
      checkFields : this function checks that : 1. all important fields are filled 2. all important fields are filled correctly 3. unimportant fields are filled correctly as well (if they are filled) the function update the "sum" variable to keep the number of rows in the sale

      editInitialization : this functions handle the case in which the sale is already existed.
      void initialize(java.net.URL arg0, java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
      initialize : this functions handle unabled \ disabled fields in the beginning of the form it also set value to every choice box I have in this form the function act differently if the sale is new or existed
      void saveInfoIntoMySqlTable()
      saveInfoIntoMySqlTable saves all the correct data into sales table in mySql.

    • Method Detail

      • editInitialization

        public void editInitialization(java.lang.String productNameS,
                               java.lang.String discountS,
                               java.lang.String startDateS,
                               java.lang.String daysDurationS,
                               java.lang.String startHourS,
                               java.lang.String hoursDurationS,
                               java.lang.String gasStationS,
                               java.lang.String pictureColorS,
                               java.lang.String saleCodeS)
        editInitialization : this functions handle the case in which the sale is already existed. it initialize the existed sale details in the corresponding text fields and variables
        Parameters:
        are - all the parameters of the sale table from mySql
        productNameS - = the product the sale is about
        discountS - = the discount the sale is giving
        startDateS - = the date the sale starts
        daysDurationS - = how many days the sale stands
        startHourS - = the hour in a day that the sale start
        hoursDurationS - = how many hours the sale stands
        gasStationS - = the gas station of the sale
        pictureColorS - = the picture in which the sale uses to display itself
        saleCodeS - = the unique code of this sale

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL arg0,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
        initialize : this functions handle unabled \ disabled fields in the beginning of the form it also set value to every choice box I have in this form the function act differently if the sale is new or existed
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • saveInfoIntoMySqlTable

        public void saveInfoIntoMySqlTable()
        saveInfoIntoMySqlTable saves all the correct data into sales table in mySql. it also get a unique sale code for this sale and save it too.

      • checkFields

        public boolean checkFields()
        checkFields : this function checks that : 1. all important fields are filled 2. all important fields are filled correctly 3. unimportant fields are filled correctly as well (if they are filled) the function update the "sum" variable to keep the number of rows in the sale
        Returns:
        boolean - the function return true if all check passed successfully and false otherwise

      • checkDate

        public boolean checkDate()
        checkDate : this function checks if the inserted date is correct it will be correct only if the date value is a date after todey's date
        Returns:
        boolean - the function return true if all check passed successfully and false otherwise
